biotools.summary: ISTDECO (In Situ Transcriptomics Decoding by Deconvolution) is a simple tool for deconvolving combinatorial image data generated by FISH techniques into series of non-combinatorial images.

bioschemas.name: ISTDECO
bioschemas.summary: ISTDECO (In Situ Transcriptomics Decoding by Deconvolution) is a simple tool for deconvolving combinatorial image data generated by FISH techniques into series of non-combinatorial images.
